name: Crossfire (itch) (Besus)
description:
For anyone who grew up in the 90's, they will almost certainly remember the commercial for Crossfire. One random day a few months ago day, the commercial popped in to my head, so I decided to re-create the game as a Web GL game. About 5 hours later, and this was the end result!

The game is single player only against AI.
